title: Grammar Quiz. Level A1
description: This test estimates if your grammar level corresponds to A1 level. If you get 100% right answers it is higly likely you have A1 or higher in Grammar.

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
incorrectAnswers: I'm a doctor and my sister are a nurse.
I be a doctor and my sister are a nurse.
I am a doctor and my sister am a nurse.
questions.correctAnswer: I'm a doctor and my sister is a nurse.

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
incorrectAnswers: This is my glasses over there.
These are my glasses over there.
That is my glasses over there.
questions.correctAnswer: Those are my glasses over there.
